meanings.definition: A tropical fruit with a thick rind and sweet, yellow flesh.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the juicy mammee at the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The market sells fresh mammee fruits every summer.
meanings.sent3: The playful monkey juggled a ripe mammee fruit.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a ripe mammee fruit.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the mammee filled the room.

meanings.definition: The tree that bears the mammee fruit.
meanings.sent1: The tall mammee tree provided shade in the garden.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new mammee tree in the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel climbed the mammee tree for fun.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the mammee tree reached for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the mammee tree rustled in the breeze.
